app.name: LocumTrueRate
app.subtitle: Find Your Perfect Locum Tenens Position

description.short: The premier platform for locum tenens physicians. Search jobs, calculate rates, and manage your career.
description.full:
LocumTrueRate is the most trusted platform for locum tenens physicians seeking temporary medical positions across the United States.

**Key Features:**

• **Comprehensive Job Search** - Browse thousands of locum tenens opportunities with advanced filters for specialty, location, and compensation

• **Smart Rate Calculator** - Calculate your true take-home pay with our industry-leading calculator that factors in taxes, expenses, and benefits

• **Offline Access** - Save jobs and continue browsing even without an internet connection

• **Secure Applications** - Apply to positions with one tap using biometric authentication

• **Real-time Notifications** - Get instant alerts for new jobs matching your criteria

• **Direct Messaging** - Communicate directly with healthcare facilities and recruiters

• **Document Management** - Store and share your credentials, licenses, and certifications securely

• **Market Insights** - Access salary trends and market data for your specialty

**Why LocumTrueRate?**

- Verified healthcare facilities only
- No spam or duplicate listings
- Transparent compensation details
- Free for physicians
- HIPAA-compliant security

Join thousands of physicians who trust LocumTrueRate to advance their locum tenens careers. Download now and find your next opportunity!

ios.promotional_text: New: Biometric login, offline mode, and enhanced job alerts!

android.short_description: Find locum tenens jobs, calculate rates, manage your medical career
